Nederlandse Faunistische Mededelingen

Coleoptera

Nederland
Verspreiding
europeana:record.dc:description: Interesting records of beetles in The Netherlands (Coleoptera: Staphylinidae, Nitidulidae, Dermestidae) Tachyporus quadriscopulatus Pandell√©, 1869 has been recorded for the second time in the Netherlands at Arcen and Velden, province of Limburg. After 27 years, a third record of Carpophilus marginellus Motschulsky, 1858 can be reported from St. Geertruid, in the southern part of the province of Limburg. One specimen was found outdoors, in a wood. One specimen of Anthrenocerus australis Hope, 1843 was also found outdoors, in Oost- Maarland also in southern Limburg, sitting on a flower in a meadow.
europeana:record.dcterms:isPartOf: Bijzondere kevervondsten in Nederland (Coleoptera: Staphylinidae, Nitidulidae, Dermestidae) (URN:ISSN:01692453) (Volume 9)
